overview:
Michael is Co-Founder & President, Technology for BenchBucket. Michael brings a background in programming, web design, as well as experience as an entrepreneur.

Michael is responsible for setting the overall direction and product strategy for BenchBucket. He leads the design of BenchBucket’s service and development of its core technology and infrastructure.

Michael is a graduate of the Conestoga College Computer Program and Analysis program. Since graduating, Michael has worked for companies such as Nortel, Ontario Lottery and Gaming Commission, Center for International Governance Innovation, and PEERGroup in various application development roles.

Michael also developed and founded Pet Supreme, a website where breeders, pet store owners and adoption agencies come together to help people around the world find the perfect pet. However, he has put this project on hold to pursue BenchBucket.

Furthermore, Michael has been active as a coach and participant in sports all his life. Michael was a springboard diver and instructor at the KW Diving Club, and is still active in menâ€™s league soccer and basketball.
